articles.title: Record green energy output helps India ease coal shortage in May - Economic Times
articles.description: The share of renewable energy sources in power output rose to 14.1% in May from 10.2% in April. Coal made room for it, dropping to 72.4% of Indian generation from 76.8%. However, coal's share was still higher than its 70.9% of May 2021.
articles.content: Record green energy output reduced Indian dependence on coal in May, despite 23.5% growth in power demand, contributing to a rise in utilities' coal inventories, a Reuters analysis of government data… [+2552 chars]
